item.title: Now im Full (with Tech)
item.description:
Im Having now a Tablet

After a Long Time without Tech Stuff in my Life, im Back! Now i Buyed a Tablet Yesterday and now i had Time to configure it, so here a Post about it

What do i do with it

Firstly i Buyed it for Notes and School but now i have, i can Start Projects that need a Tablet (maybe more later) but now what did i do?
item.content:
Im Having now a Tablet

After a Long Time without Tech Stuff in my Life, im Back! Now i Buyed a Tablet Yesterday and now i had Time to configure it, so here a Post about it

What do i do with it

Firstly i Buyed it for Notes and School but now i have, i can Start Projects that need a Tablet (maybe more later) but now what did i do?

I Installed These Apps:

  • Nextcloud (For my Notes and Documentation)
  • Firefox (For a Browser thats not Chrome)
  • MacroDroid (For a Automation (more later))
  • KWGT (For Widgets (not Setup now))
  • Sketchbook (Just for Fun)

For what do you need MacroDroid?

I need it for a Automation that disable Wifi after a Hour when im Connected with my Mobile Hotspot

And now?

Now i can use it for Notes and some Shit.

And i want to Use it further for some little Projects and maybe a Second Screen for my Laptop
